item.title: Your Free Retro Arcade Awaits - Play Classic Games Instantly
item.description:
Your Free Retro Arcade Awaits: Play Classic Games Instantly

Hey there! Remember the thrill of dropping a quarter into a massive arcade cabinet, the hum of the monitor, and the satisfying click-clack of the joystick? What if I told you that entire feeling—the classics, the nostalgia, the pure, unadulterated fun—is now just a click away, completely free?

Well, grab your virtual tokens, because I’ve built a little digital playground just for us. Welcome to https://arcade.joshuagoth.com. It’s my passion project: a simple, no-fuss website where you can dive straight into a library of classic games and play them instantly in your browser. No downloads (unless you want to!), no complicated setups, no credit cards. Just you, your browser, and a treasure trove of retro goodness.

item.title: New Nintendo Gaming Project Coming Soon
item.description:
My Love Affair with Nintendo is Becoming a New Project

It’s no secret that I have been a huge fan of Nintendo since I was about nine or ten years old. It all started on a Christmas morning back in 1988. I had just come home from the ER the day before after my first serious brush with death, and that morning, I unwrapped my first Nintendo Entertainment System. Call it what you will; Addiction or brain Damage, but from that moment on, there was simply no turning back. That gray box wasn’t just a toy; it was a portal to something that, like many others, helped shaped some of my childhood and the rest of my life.
